title: Bug 6536: Adding Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
OB: When attempting to add Javadoc comments to a field in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens. The Javadoc comments are not added or updated for the selected field.
EB: I expect that when I select a field in the Type Hierarchy view and attempt to add Javadoc comments, the comments should be successfully added to the selected field. This functionality should work as intended.
SR:
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view in the software.
2. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view.
3. Attempt to add or update Javadoc comments for the selected field.
